course learning objectives: - Become familiar with the main features of the MATLAB integrated design environment and its user interfacesn- Understand the MATLAB Desktop, Command window and the Graph Window.n- Able to do simple and complex calculation using MATLAB.n- Able to understand how to automate commands with scripts ,n- To Increase automation by encapsulating modular tasks as user-defined functions.n- Understand the tools that are essential in solving engineering problems
